summary: The implementation successfully addresses all five requirements. The backend provides user registration with persistent storage and snake segment tracking. The frontend includes a registration form, dynamic 2D canvas with continuous snake animation, real-time polling for updates, and a cohesive emerald/teal visual theme with smooth animations. All acceptance criteria appear to be met based on the diff evidence.

hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not mention authentication or Internet Identity integration. The diff includes authentication hooks (useInternetIdentity.ts, useActor.ts) and an InternetIdentityProvider wrapper that were not requested.
The BuildRequest does not specify dark mode as a requirement. The implementation includes comprehensive dark mode styling in index.css and tailwind.config.js.
